SELECT employeeId,employeeName,employeeNo, workDepID,workDepName,genderCode, genderCodeValue, rowsCount FROM ( SELECT a.employeeId, a.employeeName, a.employeeNo, a.workDepID, b.depName workDepName, a.genderCode, (CASE WHEN a.genderCode = 1 THEN '男' WHEN a.genderCode = 2 THEN '女' END) genderCodeValue, rownum rowsCount FROM fw_employee a, fw_department b where a.isPost ='是' and a.workDepID = b.depId
and ( instr(b.depName,#{employeeName}) >0 or instr(a.employeeName,#{employeeName}) >0)
order by workDepID desc,employeeName )
rowsCount >= #{showDataLineCount} and rowsCount <= #{showDataLineCount}+20

SELECT employeeId, employeeName, employeeNo, workDepID, (SELECT depName FROM fw_department WHERE depID = a.workDepId) workDepName, genderCode, (CASE WHEN genderCode = 1 THEN '男' WHEN genderCode = 2 THEN '女' END) genderCodeValue FROM fw_employee a where employeeID = 'E80F103A6FBD4D1D8FA2F1F872C94B08'
